text.text:
To play the game, simply write the guess word with the according letters.

:point_right:All words have six letters.

You will get a reply letting you know which letters you:
:large_green_square: have correct are in the right position
:large_red_square: letter exists but not in correct position
:black_square: the letter doesn't exist in the word (no colour change)

Send another guess word until you have guessed the daily word.

:point_right: Every day you get a new word.

:point_right: On Friday you will get the overall results.
*10* points for each correct letter when failing on the full word guess.
